body: I can't join avicus even though it says there are 74 people playing. When I try to join it says the server encountered and unexpected condition which prevented from fulfilling the request
body_tagged: I can't join avicus even though it says there are 74 people playing. When I try to join it says the server encountered and unexpected condition which prevented from fulfilling the request
title: Can't join avicus

replies.body: Logins and Sessions are having some problems today. People who are online were online when both of those were up. They keep crashing so that is stopping you to join.
replies.body_tagged: Logins and Sessions are having some problems today. People who are online were online when both of those were up. They keep crashing so that is stopping you to join.

replies.body: Oh ok and do you know when it's fixed?
